text: The final piece of evidence arrived via an anonymous upload to hxxps[:]//anonfiles[.]io/evidence/moreno-case-final. Anna and Marcellus discovered that Lance Moreno had maintained a burner phone with number (202) 555-0147 registered to a shell corporation. The phone had connected to cell towers near the galleries on multiple occasions. Traffic analysis showed repeated connections to IP address 91[.]198[.]174[.]192, which hosted an encrypted communication portal. Most damning was a TOX conversation log with ID: 56A1ADE4B65B86BCD51CC73E2CD4E542179F47959FE3E0E21B4B0ACDADE51855D34D34D37CB5. The conversation explicitly discussed "cleaning" Bitcoin payments through art acquisitions. A backup contact email was found: cleanup.operations[at]securemail.ch. Marcellus immediately forwarded everything to international authorities. The evidence was irrefutable.
